service.name: updateProductQuickAdminName
service.description: Update a Product from Quick Admin

service.name: duplicateProduct
service.description: Duplicate a Product using a new productId

service.name: copyToProductVariants
service.description: Copy Virtual Product's data to the Variant Products

service.name: createSalesAgreement
service.description: Create a new sales agreement with customer for the product

service.name: quickCreateVirtualWithVariants
service.description: This will create a virtual product and return its ID, and associate all of the variants with it. It will not put the selectable features on the virtual or standard features on the variant.

service.name: deleteProductKeywords
service.description: Delete all the keywords of a product

service.name: indexProductKeywords
service.description: Index the Keywords for a Product

service.name: forceIndexProductKeywords
service.description: Induce all the keywords of a product, ignoring the flag in the Product.autoCreateKeywords flag

service.name: findProductById
service.description: Finds productId(s) corresponding to a product reference, productId or a GoodIdentification idValue

service.name: createProductPrice
service.description:
Create a Product Price.
If taxAuthGeoId and taxAuthPartyId are (or taxAuthCombinedId is (SCIPIO)) passed in then the price will be considered a price with tax included (the priceWithoutTax, priceWithTax, taxAmount, and taxPercentage fields will also be populated).
If the taxInPrice field is 'Y' then the price field will be left with the tax included (price will be equal to priceWithTax), otherwise tax will be removed from the passed in price and the price field will be equal to the priceWithoutTax field.
If taxAuthGeoId or taxAuthPartyId empty, and taxAuthCombinedId is empty (SCIPIO), then the taxInPrice field will be ignored.

service.name: saveProductPriceChange
service.description: Save History of a ProductPrice Change

service.name: uploadProductAdditionalViewImages
service.description: Upload Additional View Images For Product

service.name: getSupplierProductFeatures
service.description: Finds a list of SupplierProductFeature entities based on the productFeatureId. If a partyId is given, only product feature information for that supplier party is returned.

service.name: deleteProductCategory
service.description: SCIPIO: Delete a ProductCategory record (if no associations or members)

service.name: duplicateProductCategory
service.description: Duplicate a Product Category using from oldProductCategoryId to a new productCategoryId

service.name: safeAddProductCategoryToCategory
service.description: Safe Add ProductCategory To Category (requires fromDate)

service.name: duplicateCategoryEntities
service.description: Duplicates a named entity from one productCategoryId to another

service.name: updateContentSEOForCategory
service.description: Update SEO Content For Product Category

service.name: createRelatedUrlContentForCategory
service.description: Create Related URL Content For Product Category

service.name: updateRelatedUrlContentForCategory
service.description: Update Related URL Content For Product Category

service.name: getProductFeaturesByType
service.description: Returns a map of productFeatureTypeId -> List of ProductFeatures. If supplied with a productFeatureCategoryId, the returned result is that of all product features in that category. Otherwise, if supplied with a productFeatureGroupId, the result is all features of that feature group. Otherwise, if there is a productId, the returned result is that of all features applied to that product. If the optional productFeatureApplTypeId is specified, only features with application of that type will be returned (this would only make sense along with a productId parameter.)

service.name: getAllExistingVariants
service.description: Takes a productId and a List of ProductFeatureAndAppl entities and returns a List of productIds which are existing varaints with those features applied.

service.name: getVariantCombinations
service.description: For a product, returns a List of all possible product feature combinations, based on all SELECTABLE features which are applied to the product. featureCombinations is a List of Maps with the following fields: defaultVariantProductId -> default productId for the variant, based on idCodes of the features curProductFeatureAndAppls -> List of product features to be applied to this variant existingVariantProductIds -> List of productIds of variants which already have these features

service.name: getCategoryVariantProducts
service.description: Takes a productCategoryId and a list of product features and resolves all the product category's product members from virtual to variant

service.name: updateProductIfAvailableFromShipment
service.description: If property is set (catalog.properties) this will re-activate (null discountinue date) on the product if inventory is available. Triggered via ECA by shipment receipt services

service.name: removeProductPromoContent
service.description: Cancel by the thru date a Product Promo Content

service.name: removeProductContentAndImageFile
service.description: Remove Content From Product and File Image

service.name: loadBestSellingCategory
service.description: Load data of best selling category by week.

service.name: RemoveProductFromBestSellCategory
service.description: Remove products from best selling category.

service.name: AddProductToBestSellCategory
service.description: Add products to best selling category.

service.name: createMissingCategoryAndProductAltUrls
service.description: Create missing Category and Product Alternative URLs

service.name: createProdCatalogAndStoreAssoc
service.description: SCIPIO: Create a ProdCatalog and ProductStoreCatalog association

service.name: updateProdCatalogAndStoreAssoc
service.description: SCIPIO: Update a ProdCatalog and ProductStoreCatalog association

service.name: deleteProdCatalogAndStoreAssoc
service.description: SCIPIO: Delete a ProdCatalog and ProductStoreCatalog association

service.name: createProductCategoryAndCatalogAssoc
service.description: SCIPIO: Create a ProductCategory and its top association to catalog

service.name: updateProductCategoryAndCatalogAssoc
service.description: SCIPIO: Update a ProductCategory and its top association to catalog

service.name: createProductCategoryAndCategoryAssoc
service.description: SCIPIO: Create a ProductCategory and add as child of another category

service.name: updateProductCategoryAndCategoryAssoc
service.description: SCIPIO: Update a ProductCategory and its association to another category (as child)

service.name: getProductCategoryContentLocalizedSimpleTextViews
service.description: SCIPIO: For each simple-text-compatible prodCatContentTypeId, returns a list of complex record views, where the first entry is ProductCategoryContentAndElectronicText and the following entries (if any) are ContentAssocToElectronicText views.

service.name: getProductContentLocalizedSimpleTextViews
service.description: SCIPIO: For each simple-text-compatible productContentTypeIdList, returns a list of complex record views, where the first entry is ProductContentAndElectronicText and the following entries (if any) are ContentAssocToElectronicText views.

service.name: replaceProductCategoryContentLocalizedSimpleTexts
service.description: SCIPIO: Intelligently creates, updates and deletes ProductCategoryContent ALTERNATE_LOCALE simple text contents (wrapper around replaceContentLocalizedSimpleTexts)

service.name: replaceProductContentLocalizedSimpleTexts
service.description: SCIPIO: Intelligently creates, updates and deletes ProductContent ALTERNATE_LOCALE simple text contents (wrapper around replaceContentLocalizedSimpleTexts)

service.name: createProdCatalogAndStoreAssocVersatile
service.description: SCIPIO: Create a ProdCatalog and ProductStoreCatalog association (versatile)

service.name: updateProdCatalogAndStoreAssocVersatile
service.description: SCIPIO: Update a ProdCatalog and ProductStoreCatalog association (versatile)

attribute.name: deleteAssocMode
attribute.description: (remove|expire, default: remove)

service.name: deleteProdCatalogAndRelatedVersatile
service.description: SCIPIO: Delete a ProdCatalog record and various related records [WARN: may be dangerous - best-effort] (versatile)

attribute.name: deleteParentAssocSelect
attribute.description: (none|expired|all, default: expired) Controls whether deletes all (default) or only expired ProductStoreCatalog records to this category's parents

attribute.name: deleteChildAssocSelect
attribute.description: (none|expired|all, default: expired) If "expired" (default), removes children assoc records such as ProdCatalogCategory that are expired; if "all", removes all such records even if destructive. WARN: "all" mode may leave products/categories as orphans!

attribute.name: deleteSpecialAssocSelect
attribute.description: (none|expired|all, default: expired) Special-purpose association deletion mode WARN: may currently be destructive (TODO: REVIEW) - "expired" is safe but only if no expired records are still needed.

service.name: deleteProdCatalogAndStoreAssocVersatile
service.description: SCIPIO: Delete a ProdCatalog AND/OR ProductStoreCatalog association(s) (versatile)

attribute.name: deleteRecordAndRelated
attribute.description: If true, attempts to delete ProdCatalog; if false only deletes store association

service.name: addProdCatalogStoreAssocVersatile
service.description: SCIPIO: Adds a ProductStoreCatalog association, first checking to make sure doesn't already exist (versatile)

service.name: createProductCategoryAndCatAssocVersatile
service.description: SCIPIO: Create a ProductCategory and add as a top catalog category (if parentProductCategoryId is empty) or as child of another category (if parentProductCategoryId is set) (versatile)

service.name: updateProductCategoryAndCatAssocVersatile
service.description: SCIPIO: Update a ProductCategory and its top association to catalog (if parentProductCategoryId is empty) or its association to another category (if parentProductCategoryId is set) (versatile)

service.name: deleteProductCategoryCatAssocVersatile
service.description: SCIPIO: Delete a ProductCategory catalog (if parentProductCategoryId empty) or category (if parentProductCategoryId set) association (versatile)

attribute.name: deleteAssocMode
attribute.description: (remove|expire, default: remove)

service.name: deleteProductCategoryAndRelatedVersatile
service.description: SCIPIO: Delete a ProductCategory record and various related records [WARN: may be dangerous - best-effort] (versatile)

attribute.name: deleteParentAssocSelect
attribute.description: (none|expired|all, default: expired) Controls whether deletes all (default) or only expired ProductCategoryRollup and ProdCatalogCategory records to this category's parents

attribute.name: deleteChildAssocSelect
attribute.description: (none|expired|all, default: expired) If "expired" (default), removes children assoc records such as ProductCategoryMember and ProductCategoryRollup that are expired; if "all", removes all such records even if destructive. WARN: "all" mode may leave products/categories as orphans!

attribute.name: deleteContentRecursive
attribute.description: (none|active|all, default: all) Controls whether and which Content records are deleted recursively. If none, only the associations are deleted. "active" means non-expired. WARN: This function only makes sense if the Content records were meant to be product-specific and not standalone; if standalone content is linked to the product then this may cause collateral damage!

attribute.name: deleteSpecialAssocSelect
attribute.description: (none|expired|all, default: expired) Special-purpose association deletion mode, e.g. TaxAuthorityRateProduct and TaxAuthorityCategory WARN: may currently be destructive (TODO: REVIEW) - "expired" is safe but only if no expired records are still needed.

service.name: deleteProductCategoryAndCatAssocVersatile
service.description: SCIPIO: Delete a ProductCategory record (if no members) AND/OR a catalog/category association based on wether parentProductCategoryId set (versatile)

attribute.name: deleteRecordAndRelated
attribute.description: If true, attempts to delete ProductCategory (using deleteProductCategoryAndRelatedVersatile); if false only deletes catalog or category association

service.name: addProductCategoryCatAssocVersatile
service.description: SCIPIO: Adds a category to catalog or category, attempting to prevent multiple associations (versatile)

service.name: copyProductCategoryCatAssocVersatile
service.description: SCIPIO: Copies a ProductCategory assoc by creating a new assoc (catalog or category assoc), basically a special wrapper around addProductCategoryCatAssocVersatile (versatile)

attribute.name: returnAssocFields
attribute.description: If true, the assoc fields for the new assoc will be outputted back to the prefix-less fields in addition to the "to_"-prefixed ones (i.e., fromDate will be output in both "fromDate" and "to_fromDate"). If false, the new assoc fields are output only to the "to_"-prefixed fields. This can be used in events for switching the target easily after the update.

service.name: moveProductCategoryCatAssocVersatile
service.description: SCIPIO: Moves a ProductCategory assoc by creating a new assoc (catalog or category assoc) and removing or expiring the original (versatile)

attribute.name: deleteAssocMode
attribute.description: (remove|expire, default: remove)

service.name: getProductCategoryExtendedDataVersatile
service.description: SCIPIO: Gets extended ProductCategory data (originally written for catalog tree edit form) (versatile)

service.name: createProductAndCatAssocVersatile
service.description: SCIPIO: Create a Product and add to category (specialized variant of createProductInCategory) (versatile)

service.name: updateProductAndCatAssocVersatile
service.description: SCIPIO: Update a Product and category assoc (versatile)

service.name: deleteProductCatAssocVersatile
service.description: SCIPIO: Delete a Product and category assoc (versatile)

attribute.name: deleteAssocMode
attribute.description: (remove|expire, default: remove)

service.name: deleteProductAndRelatedVersatile
service.description: SCIPIO: Delete a Product record and various related records [WARN: may be dangerous - best-effort] (versatile)

attribute.name: deleteParentAssocSelect
attribute.description: (none|expired|all, default: expired) Controls whether deletes all (default) or only expired ProductCategoryMember records to this category's parents

attribute.name: deleteChildAssocSelect
attribute.description: (none|expired|all, default: expired) If "expired" (default), removes children assoc records that are expired; if "all", removes all such records even if destructive. WARN: "all" mode may leave products/categories as orphans!

attribute.name: deleteContentRecursive
attribute.description: (none|active|all, default: all) Controls whether and which Content records are deleted recursively. If none, only the associations are deleted. "active" means non-expired. WARN: This function only makes sense if the Content records were meant to be product-specific and not standalone; if standalone content is linked to the product then this may cause collateral damage!

attribute.name: deleteAssocProductRecursive
attribute.description: (none|active|all, default: all) Controls whether and which associated "to"/"child" Products are deleted recursively. If none, only the associations are deleted. "active" means non-expired. WARN: Risk of collateral damage

attribute.name: deleteSpecialAssocSelect
attribute.description: (none|expired|all, default: expired) Special-purpose association deletion mode WARN: may currently be destructive (TODO: REVIEW) - "expired" is safe but only if no expired records are still needed.

service.name: deleteProductAndCatAssocVersatile
service.description: SCIPIO: Delete a Product record (if no members) and category assoc (versatile)

attribute.name: deleteRecordAndRelated
attribute.description: If true, attempts to delete Product (using deleteProductAndRelatedVersatile); if false only deletes catalog or category association

service.name: addProductCatAssocVersatile
service.description: SCIPIO: Adds a category to category, attempting to prevent multiple associations (versatile)

service.name: copyProductCatAssocVersatile
service.description: SCIPIO: Copies a Product assoc by creating a new assoc, basically a special wrapper around addProductCatAssocVersatile (versatile)

attribute.name: returnAssocFields
attribute.description: If true, the assoc fields for the new assoc will be outputted back to the prefix-less fields in addition to the "to_"-prefixed ones (i.e., fromDate will be output in both "fromDate" and "to_fromDate"). If false, the new assoc fields are output only to the "to_"-prefixed fields. This can be used in events for switching the target easily after the update.

service.name: moveProductCatAssocVersatile
service.description: SCIPIO: Moves a Product assoc by creating a new assoc and removing or expiring the original (versatile)

attribute.name: deleteAssocMode
attribute.description: (remove|expire, default: remove)

service.name: getProductExtendedDataVersatile
service.description: SCIPIO: Gets extended Product data (originally written for catalog tree edit form) (versatile)

service.name: buildCatalogTree
service.description: SCIPIO: Builds a tree containing catalogs, categories and products using catalogs as starting point

attribute.name: state
attribute.description: Map of state attributes for top node: opened, selected, disabled. (added 2017-10-11)

attribute.name: categoryStates
attribute.description: Map of categoryIds to maps of state attributes (added 2017-10-11). WARN: can't specify specific path for many-parents

attribute.name: includeEntityData
attribute.description: Map of names to entity-like field names to include in each tree item as "[name]Entity" entries (e.g. "productEntity"). Available names: prodCatalog, productStoreCatalog, productCategory, productCategoryRollup, prodCatalogCategory, product, productCategoryMember Map values may be: * Boolean or boolean as String - true means include all fields, false none * Collection of field names to include * Map of options. Supported keys: * use - boolean, whether to use * inclFields - Collection of field names to include * exclFields - Collection of field names to exclude

attribute.name: includeAllEntityData
attribute.description: If true, simply includes all available entity data; includeEntityData can still be set to specialize selection.

attribute.name: includeEmptyTop
attribute.description: If false (default), empty catalog or top node is omitted

attribute.name: categoryEntityOutMap
attribute.description: Map of categoryIds to ProductCategory GenericValues; if non-null, all categories found are added to this map (needed to avoid performing expensive traversal twice)

service.name: discontinueProduct
service.description: SCIPIO: Discontinues (manually disables) a product and updates solr.

service.name: generateProductAlternativeUrlsCore
service.description: SCIPIO: Re-generates alternative urls for product based on the ruleset outlined in SeoConfig.xml [core only - no perm check]

attribute.name: doChildProducts
attribute.description: If true and virtual, also updates the variants (NOTE: parent and children done in the same transaction)

attribute.name: includeVariant
attribute.description: Does NOT apply self, only consulted if doChildProducts true (need mostly for consistency with callers)

attribute.name: genFixedIds
attribute.description: Generate fixed IDs with pattern "${idTrim}-ALT${localeStrUp}" (idTrim is id trimmed so total length under 20), mainly for demo data generation - high risk of failure if set to true in any other case

service.name: generateProductAlternativeUrls
service.description: SCIPIO: Re-generates alternative urls for product based on the ruleset outlined in SeoConfig.xml WARN/TODO?: this service does not run for variant or other child products

service.name: generateProductCategoryAlternativeUrlsCore
service.description: SCIPIO: Re-generates alternative urls for category based on the ruleset outlined in SeoConfig.xml [core only - no perm check]

attribute.name: genFixedIds
attribute.description: Generate fixed IDs with pattern "${idTrim}-ALT${localeStrUp}" (idTrim is id trimmed so total length under 20), mainly for demo data generation - high risk of failure if set to true in any other case

service.name: generateProductCategoryAlternativeUrls
service.description: SCIPIO: Re-generates alternative urls for category based on the ruleset outlined in SeoConfig.xml

attribute.name: webSiteId
attribute.description: May pass webSiteId OR productStoreId

attribute.name: productStoreId
attribute.description: May pass webSiteId OR productStoreId

attribute.name: prodCatalogId
attribute.description: Limits to a specific catalog

attribute.name: prodCatalogIdList
attribute.description: Limits to specific catalogs

service.name: generateWebsiteAlternativeUrls
service.description: SCIPIO: Re-generates alternative urls for store/website based on ruleset outlined in SeoConfig.xml - replaces old generateMissingSeoUrlForWebsite service FIXME?: this can include variant products, but does not yet recognize other ProductAssoc types

attribute.name: typeGenerate
attribute.description: Currently supports: product, category, all.

attribute.name: preventDuplicates
attribute.description: Tries to prevent regenerating the same URLs for the same categories and products more than once

attribute.name: useCache
attribute.description: May be slightly faster iterating if true, but not recommended

attribute.name: genFixedIds
attribute.description: Generate fixed IDs with pattern "${id}-ALT", mainly for demo data generation - high risk of failure if set to true in any other case

service.name: generateAllAlternativeUrls
service.description: SCIPIO: Re-generates alternative urls for ALL stores/websites based on ruleset outlined in SeoConfig.xml

attribute.name: typeGenerate
attribute.description: Currently supports: product, category, all.

attribute.name: useCache
attribute.description: May be slightly faster iterating if true, but not recommended

attribute.name: genFixedIds
attribute.description: Generate fixed IDs with pattern "${id}-ALT", mainly for demo data generation - high risk of failure if set to true in any other case

service.name: removeProductAlternativeUrlsCore
service.description: SCIPIO: Removes alternative urls for product [core only - no perm check]

attribute.name: doChildProducts
attribute.description: If true and virtual, also updates the variants (NOTE: parent and children done in the same transaction)

attribute.name: includeVariant
attribute.description: Does NOT apply self, only consulted if doChildProducts true (need mostly for consistency with callers)

service.name: removeProductAlternativeUrls
service.description: SCIPIO: Removes alternative urls for product

service.name: removeProductCategoryAlternativeUrlsCore
service.description: SCIPIO: Remove alternative urls for category [core only - no perm check]

service.name: removeProductCategoryAlternativeUrls
service.description: SCIPIO: Remove alternative urls for category

service.name: removeWebsiteAlternativeUrls
service.description: SCIPIO: Removes alternative URLs for the website FIXME?: this can include variant products, but does not yet recognize other ProductAssoc types

attribute.name: targetTypes
attribute.description: Currently supports: product, category, all.

service.name: removeAllAlternativeUrls
service.description: SCIPIO: Removes alternative urls from all products and categories

attribute.name: targetTypes
attribute.description: Currently supports: product, category, all.

service.name: generateWebsiteAlternativeUrlSitemapFiles
service.description: Creates sitemaps in filesystem using product/category alternative URLs, for WebSite, using configurations from sitemaps.properties

attribute.name: useCache
attribute.description: May be slightly faster iterating if true, but not recommended

service.name: generateAllAlternativeUrlSitemapFiles
service.description: Creates sitemaps in filesystem using product/category alternative URLs, for all WebSites that have it enabled, using configurations from sitemaps.properties

attribute.name: useCache
attribute.description: May be slightly faster iterating if true, but not recommended

service.name: exportAlternativeUrlsEntityXmlOptionsInterface
service.description: Traversal options for alt URL entity XML services

attribute.name: typeExport
attribute.description: Currently supports: product, category, all.

attribute.name: preventDuplicates
attribute.description: Tries to prevent regenerating the same URLs for the same categories and products more than one

attribute.name: useCache
attribute.description: May be slightly faster iterating if true, but not recommended

attribute.name: linePrefix
attribute.description: String prefix for each line, typically an indent

attribute.name: recordGrouping
attribute.description: Supported values: NONE/MAJOR_OBJECT (default), ENTITY_TYPE

service.name: exportAlternativeUrlsEntityXmlWriterInterface
service.description: Output options for alt URL entity XML services

attribute.name: asString
attribute.description: If true, will return result as a string in outString in addition to outputting to the passed outWriter if any was passed (if none, also returns a new StringWriter)

attribute.name: outWriter
attribute.description: Writer to output the formatted XML records to

attribute.name: outString
attribute.description: If this is set to "Y" or "true" on input and the outWriter is either not set or a StringWriter, this will contain the output as a string upon success.

service.name: exportWebsiteAlternativeUrlsEntityXml
service.description: Exports alternative urls for given website to entity XML data out writer

service.name: exportAllAlternativeUrlsEntityXml
service.description: Export all alternative URLs into a single output to entity XML data out writer

service.name: exportWebsiteAlternativeUrlsEntityXmlFile
service.description: Exports alternative urls for given website or all websites to entity XML data file

attribute.name: outFile
attribute.description: Should begin with component://

attribute.name: templateType
attribute.description: Supported: comment-delimited (TODO: ftl)

attribute.name: dataBeginMarker
attribute.description: All file contents before this marker is copied from the template to the outFile

attribute.name: templateFile
attribute.description: Should begin with component://

service.name: exportAlternativeUrlsEntityXmlFileFromConfig
service.description: Exports alternative urls for given website or all websites to entity XML data file, from config in seo-urls.properties files

attribute.name: configName
attribute.description: Name of config in seo-urls.properties, in format: seourl.datafile.[configName].[params]

attribute.name: configNameList
attribute.description: List of config names in seo-urls.properties, in format: seourl.datafile.[configName].[params]
